summary: Its kinda simple but i thought it was cool so... here you go
descriptionHtml:
basically it changes your enchanting level to 99999 and then gives you the amulet then sets it back to 100 (you can change that to whatever enchanting level you want)

Instructions!!!!: put txt file in skyrim directory not data!!!  in game press the ~ sign then type                      bat amulet. then you get the amulet in your inventory.
author: sheeni
